txt.en: 'Hah! King Thorin's sense of humour has escaped you, I think.'
'Do not trouble yourself with this task! He has asked for you to return to him at once.'
'We have won a great victory, but Vethúg was not the last of the Frost-heart's brood.'
'Even if we reclaim Thikil-gundu, who among you can promise that the Anvil will not crack once more?'
'The Steel Keep and its hoards are lost to the Longbeards! There will be no expedition!'
'It is thus forbidden by Thorin Stonehelm, son of Dáin, King under the Mountain!'
